name: BLOKI
description:
BLOKI is an educational game about residential architecture from the Soviet era. It aims to make people aware of the important function of the colors of buildings, as well as to encourage reflection on the spaces around us. The game also allows you to signal your own needs related to the aesthetics and functioning of these estates while showing the consequences of their implementation.

Work plan at the estate:
1. Prepare a facade design for two residential buildings. Use the color palette and available geometric patterns. Follow the instructions to earn as many aesthetic points as possible.
2. Get to know the elements of the surroundings available in the Służew nad Dolinką estate. Choose environmentally friendly, look after social initiatives, and the necessary elements of small architecture. Earn points for aesthetics, sustainability, and functionality.
3. Share your vision with us - share your design on Instagram with #BLOKIgame.
